name: Sexy Space Airlines
description:
Cryogenically preserved and thrust 100 years into the future, you are awakened by two futuristic bombshells in an era where humans and aliens co-exist. You now embark on an expedition to expand your space transport enterprise with the help of the most attractive females you can find to manage your fleets. The success of this venture hinges on your ability to satisfy the demands of your attendants, one way or another.

Sexy Space Airlines allows you to explore the lives of these multi-faceted characters via a messenger system that can be used to interact and provide gifts to them. Flood them with enough gifts to get romantic with them and uncover a few solar-heated adult scenes in the process.

Traveling in space is no piece of cake with turbulence and a barrage of asteroids to maneuver, but successfully clearing these obstacles will allow you to get hold of a few goodies during your trips. Collect cards for your characters during your adventures throughout this solar system and beyond, to upgrade the skill levels of your attendants and help you progress through the game easier.

The rest is for you to discover. At Sexy Space Airlines, every day is a spacial one.
